name: Ice Cream Crush
description:
This game is developed for the mobile course of the master's degree in Computer Game Development in Verona's University, using Unity and C#. 

Get the combination of 3 or more ice creams to score points.

The game has two game modes:

  • Bomb mode, when you use the bomb to solve a combination, it explodes destroying all the ice creams around it.
  •  Ice mode, when you use ice to solve a combination, it freezes time for a few seconds.
